prompt: A mirror selfie of a young East Asian woman (around 25) in an otaku-style computer corner. She has waist-length, medium brown hair, styled straight with slightly curled ends. She's wearing a light blue cropped knit cardigan (top two buttons fastened, revealing a blue French-style bra), denim ultra-short shorts with blue satin ribbon bows, and blue and white striped over-the-knee socks. She holds a smartphone in front of her face, obscuring her identity, with a blue cute mascot phone case. She is standing in a slight contrapposto pose, with her left arm hanging naturally. The focus is on her torso and shorts. The scene is bathed in soft, diffused daylight from a large window on the left, filtered through sheer curtains, creating a soft blue color tone. The white balance is set to 5200K. The background features a bedroom computer corner seen through the mirror. The corner includes a white desk, a single monitor displaying a soft blue wallpaper, a mechanical keyboard with white keycaps on a blue desk mat, a mouse on a small blue mouse pad, a PC tower with blue case lighting, three anime figures, a poster of a pagoda, a cat-shaped desk lamp with blue accents, a transparent glass of water, and a tall green leafy plant by the window. All originally pink elements have been replaced with blue tones (baby blue to sky blue/periwinkle blue). The aspect ratio is 1:1, cropped from the top of the head to mid-thigh, including the desk, monitor, PC tower, and plant. Avoid any appearance of pink/magenta, beauty filters, exaggerated anatomy, NSFW elements, logos, or fake portrait-mode blur. Shot with a smartphone rear camera (26mm equivalent focal length, f/1.8, ISO 100, shutter speed 0.01s, EV -0.3) via the mirror from a slightly high angle. The subject is 0.6m from the mirror, and the camera is 0.5m from the mirror. Natural smartphone deep depth of field; background clearly visible with no artificial blur.
